title: Short Ghost and Horror Collection 002
creator: Various
description: An occasional collection of fifteen stories featuring ghoulies, ghosties, long-leggedy beasties and things that go bump in the night. Expect shivers up your spine, the stink of human flesh, and the occasional touch of wonder. Readers include: Sandarroch (Sandy Wood) Craig Campbell Glen Hallstrom Will Tijerina Larissa Little Marian Martin Bellona Times Alan Winterrowd Timothy Ferguson J.W. McCalvin James Christopher M4B audiobook of Complete Book
subject: librivox; audiobook; short stories; ghost; horror
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
